story.title: =====The Beginning=====
story.text: You stumble into an old crumbling building, it is placed on a property that spans as far as you can see.

story.title: Continuation of The Beginning
story.text: There is a rotting wooden door that you decide to wearily walk through.

story.title: =====First Room=====
story.text:
You enter a room, there is three exits, a {ITEM_NAME} on the floor and a {ENEMY_NAME} in front of you!
What will you do?
